content: please note- this pattern is written in english american english in american crochet terms this pattern does not have a chart this amazing shells of one color shawl is designed using the shells stitch it is lovely in many different colors especially variegated and ombre yarns or one color this pattern has repeats to easily make this shawl bigger this shawls finished size is 63 inches across straight edge by 31 inches from middle to tip again you can make this shawl bigger by just continuing with the repeats there is a gauge pattern included with this pattern for yarn and hook comparisons but size numbers may differ for each individual materials needed aran worsted weight yarn about 1032 yards 450g lion brand yarns mandala ombre color way chi g 4 25 mm hook scissors level of difficulty intermediate* *if you know how to single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch chain and read basic crochet patterns you can do this this pattern has many photos for referencing each row also i am always around for questions so feel free to message me here please make sure to read all of the pattern including special notes
